casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Daryl JONES 336A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 9, 2017 James R. Grant, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Jones, Daryl Lamont.

Glenn G. Gerding, Appellate Defender.

Carole Biggers, Assistant Attorney General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 7th of November 2017 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of November 2017."

Defendant-Appellant shall have up to and including the 8th day of December 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
